title: Acceleration of particle as enters magnetic field

content.prompt: A particle of charge +Q moving with speed vo enters a region of constant magnetic field B directed into the page, as shown above. The initial direction and magnitude of the acceleration of the particle as it enters the magnetic field is toward the

choices.label: bottom of the page and proportional to B
bottom of the page and proportional to vo
top of the page and inversely proportional to vo
top of the page and inversely proportional to B
top of the page and proportional to both B and vo

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
